scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:external"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w external-portal
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend && npm run lint -w shared && npm run lint -w external-portal
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w backend && npm run lint:fix -w frontend && npm run lint:fix -w shared && npm run lint:fix -w external-portal
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w backend && npm run type-check -w frontend && npm run type-check -w shared
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w backend && npm run clean -w frontend && npm run clean -w shared
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w frontend && npm run install -w backend && npm install -w shared && npm install -w external-portal
scripts.all-checks: npm run quality-check && npm run architecture-check && npm run security-check
